Text.Page:
Killian has brainwashed a number of Tenebrara mercenaries. At first it was just the leaders, but now it seems he's gone after the reapers as well.

I have to protect the arcanists here or I'd go take care of them myselfâ€”but orders are orders.

I need you to head out there and clear them out for me. Quickly, before they can do any more of Killian's ill will.

Hey, not bad! Not sure even I could have done better.

Thanks for your help! This should help us keep the situation under control.
